com.shop.cache.api.server
Interface SCServerContext

public interface SCServerContext

Builder interface for containing server data. NOTE: it is not necessary to set every value. Implementations should provide reasonable defaults where possible

Method Summary

          Returns the log file path

Method Detail

port

SCServerContext port(int port)
Port for main server to listen on

Parameters:
port - the port
Returns:
this

monitorPort

SCServerContext monitorPort(int monitorPort)
Port for monitor server to listen on. This is optional. The monitor server helps in detecting server failures. If the main server fails (out of disk space, etc.) it will close. However, the monitor server will stay active and will report that the main server has gone down.

Parameters:
monitorPort - the port or 0 for no monitor server
Returns:
this

logPath

SCServerContext logPath(java.io.File logPath)
Sets a path to a log file.

Parameters:
logPath - the path or null for no logging
Returns:
this
